item.title: Fawn add a quote by توفيق الحكيم
item.description: "إن عقل المرأة إذا ذبل ومات ،فقد ذبل عقل الأمة كلها ومات." -- توفيق الحكيم

item.title: Fawn add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "Most maidens are perfectly capable of rescuing themselves in my experience, at least the ones worth something, in any case." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Fawn add a quote by Jerome Makiti
item.description: "A true friend is the one who accepts us the way we are. Despite our wounds in life, they make our lives worth living..." -- Jerome Makiti

item.title: Fawn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Fawn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Fawn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time." -- A.A. Milne
